def.dt: :a process, technique, or system for achieving a result
:a doctrine that holds natural processes (as of life) to be mechanically determined and capable of complete explanation by the laws of physics and chemistry
:the fundamental processes involved in or responsible for an action, reaction, or other natural phenomenon compare defense mechanism
:an often unconscious mental process (as repression) that makes possible compromise solutions to personal problems
:a mode of behavior or thinking adopted to evade unpleasant facts or responsibilities
